SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.requestMethods.annotations

Annotation Interface HEAD

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface HEAD
Mark endpoint method as an HTTP HEAD request method endpoint. There are few points that API users should follow.
  • Annotated method must be public and static.
  • Annotated method must use return type as HttpResponse.
  • Annotated method must have 2 parameters. HttpHeadRequest and HttpResponse respectively.
  • The class holding the annotated method must be annotated with HttpEndpoint.
When doing the in-method processing it's recommended to return the same HttpResponse that got as a method parameter with any changes (for more info, see HttpResponse class). 
     
     @HEAD("/sampleHeadEndpoint")
     public static HttpResponse sampleHeadEndpoint(HttpHeadRequest request,
                                                   HttpResponse response) {
         // ...
         return response;
     }
Since:
v1.0.0
See Also:
  • HttpHeadRequest
  • HttpResponse
  • HttpStatusCode
  • HttpResponse.setStatusCode(HttpStatusCode)
  • io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.requestMethods.annotations
  • HttpEndpoint
API Note:
Make sure to change the HTTP status code appropriately when returning the HttpResponse. The default value is 200 OK.
